p: A comparison between the native and the invaded range was used to assess whether E. californica's niche has been conserved in central Chile. For this comparison, niche similarity was measured using Schoener's D overlap index [37], the result falling between 0 (no overlap) and 1 (complete overlap). The D overlap index was tested against chance using re-sampling procedures [7], [35], [37]. Following Petitpierre et al. 2012 [7], three regions of the niche, either in the native and invaded range, were considered representative of niche dynamics for invasive species:
